3.3M5

This is pretty bad.

1. Check out the org.eclipse.browser plug-in from cvs
2. Open the solutions/Exercise2b/browser.product.

If the editor tries to open on the launching page, you are screwed, the editor won't initialize.

If the editor opens on any other page, try switching to the launching page and you will get the exception.

Also:
1. the field validation for the launcher images complains about files not being there, while in fact, they are there.
2. try typing in the ICO field and watch how the hover message for the warning is complaining about a value that is different from the value entered in the filed.  usually off by one letter or so.

Fixed.  Patch released to HEAD.

Target:  3.3 M6
Patch:   patch_175364_2007-03-08_14-30.txt

Severity for ICO validation was being passed in as -1 causing message manager 
to choke.

I was unable to reproduce any of the other mentioned field validation problems.
Please open up a separate bug report if you experience these problems again.
